DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , single-dose , crossover clinical trial evaluate food effect pharmacokinetics Dilatrend SR 64mg capsule oral administration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Open-label , Single-dose , Crossover Clinical Trial Evaluate Food Effect Pharmacokinetics Dilatrend SR 64mg Capsule After Oral Administration Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Between 20 age 50 age healthy adult Weight 55kg , IBW 20 % within range Agreement write informed consent Subject hypersensitivity reaction clinically significant history investigational drug Clinically significant cardiovascular system , respiratory system , liver , renal , endocrine system , gastrointestinal system , central nervous system , blood tumor , mental disease , skin disease Inadequate result laboratory test AST ( SGOT ) ALT ( SGPT ) > 1.5 x upper limit normal range Continued take caffeine ( caffeine > 5 cup/day ) , drink ( alcohol > 210 g/day ) clinical trial drink severe heavy smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarette per day ) Creatinine clearance < 80ml/min Subject know history ( gastrointestinal disease operation ) affect absorption drug Subject take abnormal meal affect ADME drug Previously participate trial within 90 day Previously make whole blood donation within 60 day component blood donation within 30 day Subject positive reaction reason laboratory test result An impossible one participate clinical trial investigator 's decision include reason laboratory test result
